Text: dear spudmasher, we all appreciate the wonderful music you have posted but we can't download any of it.  could you and others please seed so we can all enjoy the music?  thank you so much.

Curiously, all of the torrents by spudmasher have the same issues, including those by Bill Nelson which I dumped excepting The Romance of Sust..etc. which worked eventually. I am now seeding supposedly with 3 other seeds on that torrent but with no peers showing up. This has happened before... WTF..???
